article:
Ever wished for a simple way to get a free, fully featured domain for your personal projects?  Say hello to `owns.it.com`! This awesome GitHub project lets you snag a subdomain like `yourname.owns.it.com` in minutes, without the hassle of complicated domain registrations or pricey hosting plans.  Think of it as a super-easy way to give your projects a professional online home.

The process is incredibly straightforward.  First, you fork and star the repository – a small price to pay for a free domain! Next, you create a simple JSON file that tells the system a bit about your project and where it lives (like your GitHub repo). This file specifies your desired subdomain and includes details like a short description, your contact email, and DNS records.  It's all very clearly explained in the project's README, with helpful examples.

Once you've created your JSON file, you submit a pull request. The maintainers review it, and after merging, your domain is ready!  The whole process, from forking the repo to having your domain live, is surprisingly quick, usually under 24 hours (often much faster!).

But here's the real kicker: this isn't just a barebones domain.  `owns.it.com` domains come packed with features you'd normally pay for.  We're talking robust security with DNSSEC protection, full SSL/TLS encryption for secure connections, HTTPS enforcement to keep your site safe, and even a Web Application Firewall (WAF) to protect against malicious attacks.  It's like getting a premium hosting package without the hefty price tag.

What's even cooler is the support for various hosting providers. Whether you're using GitHub Pages, Netlify, Vercel, Cloudflare Pages, or any of the many other platforms listed in their comprehensive guide, the project provides detailed setup instructions to seamlessly integrate your project with your chosen platform.  No more wrestling with DNS settings or struggling to configure SSL certificates. They've made it incredibly easy!

This project is a game-changer for developers who want to showcase their work, experiment with new ideas, or build personal portfolios without worrying about the technical hurdles of domain management.  It frees you from the administrative overhead, letting you focus on what truly matters: building amazing software.  Plus, the active Discord community is a fantastic resource for support and updates, ensuring you're always in the loop.
key_takeaways: Get a free subdomain on owns.it.com with minimal effort.
Enjoy a wide array of security features (SSL, DNSSEC, WAF) included for free.
Easily integrate with popular hosting platforms like GitHub Pages, Netlify, and Vercel.
The straightforward process involves creating a simple JSON file and submitting a pull request.
Benefit from a supportive Discord community for assistance and updates.
title: Level Up Your Projects: Free Domains with owns.it.com!
readme_summary: The 'register' repository offers a community-maintained registry for free subdomains under the 'owns.it.com' domain. It simplifies the process of obtaining a subdomain by providing a clear registration process involving forking the repository, creating a domain configuration file, and submitting a pull request. The service includes features like DNSSEC protection, SSL/TLS, and email support.
description: Community-maintained registry for free subdomains — 100% free
